body_html: @li-roy Something I noticed when rebasing my diffs past this one: you're doing an unchecked cast from int64_t to int16_t. I think it would be a good idea to check that we're in bounds when those casts occur. Some day someone is going to pass a number that's too big, and they'll thank you for this check.
body_text: @li-roy Something I noticed when rebasing my diffs past this one: you're doing an unchecked cast from int64_t to int16_t. I think it would be a good idea to check that we're in bounds when those casts occur. Some day someone is going to pass a number that's too big, and they'll thank you for this check.
body: @li-roy Something I noticed when rebasing my diffs past this one: you're doing an unchecked cast from `int64_t` to `int16_t`. I think it would be a good idea to check that we're in bounds when those casts occur. Some day someone is going to pass a number that's too big, and they'll thank you for this check.
